info.name: NPP Contract Management API - Complete Collection (194 Endpoints)
info.description:
Complete Postman collection for NPP Contract Management API with all 194 endpoints.

Base URL: http://34.9.77.60:8081/api

How to use:
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Run 'Login' request first to get JWT token
3. Token will be automatically saved and used for all subsequent requests
4. All requests have sample bodies pre-filled

request.description: Login with credentials. Returns JWT token that will be automatically saved for subsequent requests.
Reset password using token from email
Upload CSV or Excel file for velocity data processing. Max file size: 10MB
